description: Detects the addition of new root, CA or AuthRoot certificates to the Windows registry
name: New Root or CA or AuthRoot Certificate to Store
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"Setvalue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\Root\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\Root\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\EnterpriseCertificates\\Root\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\CA\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\CA\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\EnterpriseCertificates\\CA\\Certificates\\* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\AuthRoot\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\AuthRoot\\Certificates\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\EnterpriseCertificates\\AuthRoot\\Certificates\\*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Blob AND winlog.event_data.Details:"Binary\ Data")
author: frack113
